Sentence.value: Your doctor may want you to have this test if you had abnormal results on the partial thromboplastin time (PTT) blood-clotting test.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Your [[doctor|C0031831]] may want you to have this test if you had [[abnormal results|C0459424]] on the partial thromboplastin time (PTT) blood-clotting test.

Sentence.value: You may also need the test if a family member is known to have factor XII deficiency.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: You may also need the test if a [[family member|C0086282]] is known to have [[factor XII deficiency|C0015526]].
